long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use state-of-the-art AI text-to-speech to instantly create a podcast feed of your favorite newsletters and articles. Listen to them on the go.

How It Works

- Get Your Personal Podcast Feed: When you sign up, we provide you with a personal podcast feed URL. Simply add this URL to your favorite podcast app.

- Get Your Personal Email: When you sign up, we provide you with a personal email address. Forward your newsletters (or any email) to this address. Our text-to-speech engine will convert it to audio and add it to your podcast feed.

- Add Articles with Our Chrome Extension: Install our Chrome extension and convert any web page or article into audio with a single click.

- Try It For Free: New accounts don't require any billing information and come with enough free credits to trial the service.

- Pay As You Go: No annoying subscriptions to manage. You only pay for what you use! 10,000 characters costs 25 cents.

- Listen To A Sample: Click the play button to hear a sample from Alice in Wonderland!

To see a demo, check out: https://www.readit.bot/demo
